item.name: merchantList
item.param: merchants\[\d+\]\.\w+, merchants\[\d+\]\.dataStatus, merchants\[\d+\]\.dataStatus\.desc, merchants\[\d+\]\.dataStatus\.value, merchants\[\d+\]\.industryTypes, merchants\[\d+\]\.industryTypes\[\d+\]\.desc, merchants\[\d+\]\.industryTypes\[\d+\]\.value, pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage

item.name: merchant_platform_list
item.param: merchants\[\d+\]\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.address, merchants\[\d+\]\.telephone, merchants\[\d+\]\.openManagerPlatform, merchants\[\d+\]\.firstOperatorLoginName, merchants\[\d+\]\.firstOperatorName, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantBusinessConfigs, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantBusinessConfigs\[\d+\]\.businessConfig, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantBusinessConfigs\[\d+\]\.businessConfig\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantBusinessConfigs\[\d+\]\.businessConfig\.name, pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage
